mapper.insert: INSERT tb_category(category_name, parent_id, create_time, update_time) VALUE (#{category.categoryName}, #{category.parentId}, #{category.createTime}, #{category.updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS a_id, a.title AS title, a.cover AS cover, LEFT(a.content, 30) AS content, a.views AS views, a.is_top AS isTop, a.create_time AS createTime, a.update_time AS updateTime FROM tb_category AS c LEFT JOIN tb_article_category AS ac ON ac.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN tb_article AS a ON a.id = ac.article_id WHERE c.category_name = #{param.categoryName} AND a.status = 0 AND a.is_delete = 0 ORDER BY a.create_time DESC LIMIT #{param.start},#{param.length}
